subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Hefner homered and pitched six innings, and the Mets’ latest shortstop, the light-hitting Omar Quintanilla, went 3 for 4 and scored two runs.
snippet: Jeremy Hefner homered and pitched six innings, and the Mets’ latest shortstop, the light-hitting Omar Quintanilla, went 3 for 4 and scored two runs.
